name: College Dating Simulator
description:
Title: College Dating Simulator

Platform: HTML

Genre: Dating Simulator

Rating: T

Target Market: 18+

Game Overview:
You're in your Senior year of college, but you haven't dated anyone yet. Your best friend is worried about you and introduces you to 4 new people! Who do you choose? Choose your path wisely and score in a successful date!

Game Design Team:
Josephine Nilkumhang - Game Designer
